name: Boxx 4
description:
Boxx 4 is a colorful platform game for Commodore Amiga by Retroguru.

Features:

* Classic Jump 'n' Run gameplay
* Three difficulty levels (easy, normal, hard)
* Big boss fights!
* Lot's of oldschool pixels
* Finest Amiga chiptunes

Story:

Once upon a time, in a distant land, there lived a little box-like creature named Cubo. Cubo was a happy-go-lucky creature who loved nothing more than exploring his world and find new areas.

One day, Cubo discovered that an evil robotic witch had slowly taken over his home area and was using her army of followers to torture the local inhabitants. Cubo knew he had to do something... to save everyone. ...and set out on a quest!

Certainly, getting the electronic monster eliminated wasn't easy. The way was blocked with checkpoints, but coins opened the doors magically. It seems even evil watchmen can be attracted by money. Supporters of Cyrce, the robotic witch, might still look after you and will crush you without mercy.

Can you survive and succeed your mission?

Credits:

* Code & Level Design: Lemming880
* Graphics: Koyot1222 & Dulcahn
* Music: Triace & Vedder
* Support: Mulle & Kojote

Minimum Requirements:

* Commodore Amiga 500 PAL
* Kickstart 1.3
* 512 KB RAM Extension

Please enjoy playing this game. A physical release will be for sale later at APC&TCP, Germany (late Q2/2023).

Boxx 4 won 1st prize at the Revision Party 2023 Game Compo!

Windows:

The Windows version is merely an emulator for Windows but an easy way to play the game for those new to Amiga.

Edit in notepad: FS-UAE\Configurations\Default.fs-uae and change:
fullscreen = 0 (windowed)
fullscreen = 1 (full screen) (default)
Gamepad not supported yet (needs config file). Only Joystick and keyboard
Press F12 for settings
